content.question: Which of the following statements about political socialization is true?

choices.label: Political socialization is a process that continues throughout an individual’s life.
The most powerful agent of political socialization is the school.
Political socialization ensures that citizens perceive the government as legitimate.
Citizens of one generation tend to undergo the same political socialization as other generations within the same society.
Political socialization does not occur in countries where a democratic political system and a highly educated population exist.

content.answer: Political socialization is a process that continues throughout an individual’s life.
